content.rendered:
Table Throws

Custom Table Throws and Table Cloths

Posterheadsigns.com offers table throws and tablecloths fitted for standard 6 ft and 8 ft tables, with 3 sided custom full color printing. Dye sublimation printed on stretch fabric, our table throws are lightweight for maximum portability and fully machine-washable. Our table throws are finished with hemmed edges and rounded corners for elegant draping.

Custom tablecloths are printed in any color you like or combination of colors which can include logos and pictures of products. These custom tablecloths are fitted for the standard 6ft and 8ft tables found at trade shows and conventions in Las Vegas. These table covers or table cloths are very popular at the event venues like Mandalay Bay Convention Center, Las Vegas Convention Center or the Sands Expo. These polyester fabric tablecloths can be used over and over again at different events and look great because they are wrinkle free.

Product Specs:

  • Fits a 6 ft Rectangular Table
  • Full Color Dye Sublimation Printing
  • Machine Washable Stretch Fabric
  • Fits table size about 72"L x 29"W x 29"H or (8ft) Fits table size about 96"L x 30"W x 29"H
  • Hemmed Edges with Rounded Corners
  • 3-Sided Table Throw

* Production Time: 4 business days after approved artwork

Call (702) 204-2755 TO ORDER TODAY.

YouTube
